alert.note: Alert for Lowndes; Noxubee; Oktibbeha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 5:26PM CDT until July 21 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Noxubee County in east central Mississippi... Southeastern Oktibbeha County in northeastern Mississippi... Southwestern Lowndes County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 526 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Crawford, or 13 miles southeast of Starkville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Crawford around 530 PM CDT. Brooksville around 545 PM CDT. Deerbrook around 555 PM CDT. Bigbee Valley around 610 PM CDT. Prairie Point around 615 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
